text: In advance of hosting the MTV VMAs on Sunday, Katy Perry has dropped the music video to her Taylor Swift feud song, ` ` Swish Swish.'' And while it's not a ` ` Bad Blood'' rip off like her teasers lead some to believe, it is a hot mess of a basketball match with a Netflix star - studded cast ( Stranger Things and GLOW stars included ) and a couple of Swift nods. The video starts with Perry's basketball version of the ` ` Bad Blood'' wipeout prologue : YouTube YouTube... before going into a match - up between Perry's underdog team, the Tigers, versus the Sheep.
